text-node.description: Called by Adyen to update status of payments. It should always display [accepted] when finished.
Redirect to Adyen after saving order etc.

Test
Make a request to Adyen to get payment methods based on countryCode. Called from COBilling-Start

When payment is CANCELLED (user clicked Previous button), there is no all necessary info in the URL to check if it is an authorised request. Also, it's not so dangerous operation, so we can ignore this check in this case
Sometimes order cannot be found in DWRE DB even if it exists there, in that case we shouldn't reply to Adyen that all was ok in order to get a new notification
Only CREATED orders can be failed
Refused payments which are made with using Adyen payment method are handled when user is redirected back from Adyen HPP. Here we shouldn't fail an order and send a notification
Payment was successfully authorized

Handle Refused payments
Send email about failure
If the same order is tried to be cancelled more than one time, show Error page to user
Creates a Adyen payment instrument for the given basket

Authorizes a payment using a credit card. The payment is authorized by using the BASIC_CREDIT processor only and setting the order no as the transaction ID. Customizations may use other processors and custom logic to authorize credit card payment.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Just set transaction ID and processor

text-node.description: Get orderdata for the Afterpay Payment method

For security, only show the order if the amount and currency is correct.
Call the Adyen API to capture order payment
Call the Adyen API to cancel order payment
Call the Adyen API to cancel or refund order payment
